ns2:test-suite.name: Admin Login Functionality - Online Shopping System

test-case.name: should log in successfully with valid admin credentials
test-case.title: should log in successfully with valid admin credentials

failure.message: Timed out retrying after 4000ms: expected 'http://localhost/online-shopping-system-advanced-master/online-shopping-system-advanced-master/admin/admin/' to include 'index.php'
